data.headers:
Pragma: public
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Content-Type: application/vnd.ms-excel; charset=utf-8
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename={$filename}

Content-type: application/xml; charset="octet-stream"
Content-Disposition: attachment; filename={$filename}

data.smarty_template:
{$form_name} - {$view_name}

{foreach from=$display_fields item=column} {/foreach} {strip} {foreach from=$submissions item=submission} {assign var=submission_id value=$submission.submission_id} {foreach from=$display_fields item=field_info} {assign var=col_name value=$field_info.col_name} {assign var=value value=$submission.$col_name} {/foreach} {/foreach} {/strip}
{$column.field_title}
{smart_display_field form_id=$form_id view_id=$view_id submission_id=$submission_id field_info=$field_info field_types=$field_types settings=$settings value=$value}

{$form_name} - {$view_name}

{strip} {foreach from=$submissions item=submission} {assign var=submission_id value=$submission.submission_id} {foreach from=$display_fields item=field_info} {assign var=col_name value=$field_info.col_name} {assign var=value value=$submission.$col_name} {/foreach}
{$field_info.field_title} {smart_display_field form_id=$form_id view_id=$view_id submission_id=$submission_id field_info=$field_info field_types=$field_types settings=$settings value=$value}
{/foreach} {/strip}

{$form_name} - {$view_name}

{foreach from=$submissions item=submission name=row} {assign var=submission_id value=$submission.submission_id} {foreach from=$display_fields item=field_info} {assign var=col_name value=$field_info.col_name} {assign var=value value=$submission.$col_name} {/foreach}
{$field_info.field_title} {smart_display_field form_id=$form_id view_id=$view_id submission_id=$submission_id field_info=$field_info field_types=$field_types settings=$settings value=$value}
{if !$smarty.foreach.row.last}
- {$L.phrase_new_page} -

{/if} {/foreach}

{$form_name} - {$view_name}

{foreach from=$display_fields item=column} {/foreach} {strip} {foreach from=$submissions item=submission} {assign var=submission_id value=$submission.submission_id} {foreach from=$display_fields item=field_info} {assign var=col_name value=$field_info.col_name} {assign var=value value=$submission.$col_name} {/foreach} {/foreach} {/strip}
{$column.field_title}
{smart_display_field form_id=$form_id view_id=$view_id submission_id=$submission_id field_info=$field_info field_types=$field_types settings=$settings value=$value escape="excel"}

{strip}
<export>
    <export_datetime>{$datetime}</export_datetime>
    <export_unixtime>{$U}</export_unixtime>
    <form_info>
        <form_id>{$form_id}</form_id>
        <form_name><![CDATA[{$form_name}]]></form_name>
        <form_url>{$form_url}</form_url>
    </form_info>
    <view_info>
        <view_id>{$view_id}</view_id>
        <view_name><![CDATA[{$view_name}]]></view_name>
    </view_info>
    <submissions>
        {foreach from=$submissions item=submission name=row}
            <submission>
            {foreach from=$display_fields item=field_info name=col_row}
                {assign var=col_name value=$field_info.col_name}
                {assign var=value value=$submission.$col_name}
                <{$col_name}><![CDATA[{smart_display_field form_id=$form_id 
                    view_id=$view_id submission_id=$submission.submission_id
                    field_info=$field_info field_types=$field_types
                    settings=$settings value=$value}]]></{$col_name}>
            {/foreach}
        </submission>
        {/foreach}
    </submissions>
</export>
{/strip}

  <script>
  $(function() {
    $("input,textarea,select").bind("focus", function() {
      $(this).closest("form").find(".ts_field").removeClass("ts_field_row_selected");
      $(this).closest(".ts_field").addClass("ts_field_row_selected");
    });
    $(":text:visible:enabled:first").focus();
  });
  </script>
</head>

data.description: A neutral, grey-themed set of templates that lets you choose a highlight colour to match your site.

A simple, professional-looking and attractive grey-themed Template Set without a header. It contains placeholders to let you choose the highlight colour, font and font size. Labels are placed directly above the fields to provide clear identification.
A clean blue Template Set with delicate CSS3 gradients and tab-like, top-row page navigation.
A bold, bright-coloured theme with choice of colour set and footer content. Navigation is required and displayed as a left column. Uses the "Trykker" Google Web Font for a little extra snap!
A form template set based on the same styles as the default Form Tools user interface. Complete with choice of swatches!

data.description: The default Form Tools theme. It's a fixed-width theme requiring 1024 minimum width screens, with a few different colour swatches to choose from.

data.author: Ben Keen
data.description: A remodelling of the old grey-styled Form Tools 1.x theme.

data.author: ben.keen@gmail.com
data.description: A fixed-width blue-coloured theme designed for 1024 pixel minimum screens.
